channel.title: Can someone please, HELP ME?

item.title: Can someone please, HELP ME?
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

okay, when you attack with str, you get def too ! I dont get it I tried alot of things, I used the search button too if this helps here are my str codes ( i think )

f (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { // Accurate & Defensive MaxHit += (double) (1.35 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.0011111)); } else if (FightType == 2) { // Aggresive MaxHit += (double) (1.35 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.0011111)); } else if (FightType == 3) { // Controlled MaxHit += (double) (1.35 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.0011111));

If that isnt what im supposed to be changing, please tell me what to change, if it is, can you please tell me what to do? tyvm
